lead_paragraph: Across the Philippines, there were celebrations of Manny Pacquiao’s victory over Oscar De La Hoya. The president, Gloria Macapagal Arroyo, congratulated Pacquiao (48-3-2, 36 knockouts) by telephone. De La Hoya (39-6), who was stopped for only the second time in his 16-year pro career, declined to come out of his corner after the eighth round in their bout in Las Vegas late Saturday night.
